00030 #ifndef HARPS_UTILS
00031 #define HARPS_UTILS
00032 
00033 #include <harps/table/sine.hpp>
00034 #include <harps/table/exp2.hpp>
00035 
00036 #include <cmath>
00037 #include <tr1/cstdint>
00038 
00039 namespace harps {
00045   inline float loop( float _source ) {
00046     return _source - ::floorf( _source );
00047   }
00053   inline double loop( double _source ) {
00054     return _source - ::floor( _source );
00055   }
00061   inline float sin( float _theta ) {
00062     return table::sine[ static_cast< int >( loop( _theta ) * HARPS_SINE_TABLE_SIZE ) ];
00063   }
00069   inline double sin( double _theta ) {
00070     return table::sine[ static_cast< int >( loop( _theta ) * HARPS_SINE_TABLE_SIZE ) ];
00071   }
00077   inline float volume( float _linear ) {
00078     if( _linear >= 1.0f )
00079       return 0.999023f;
00080     else if( _linear < 0.0f )
00081       return 0.0f;
00082     else
00083       return table::exp2[ static_cast< int >( _linear * HARPS_EXP2_TABLE_SIZE ) ];
00084   }
00090   inline double volume( double _linear ) {
00091     if( _linear >= 1.0 )
00092       return 0.999023;
00093     else if( _linear < 0.0 )
00094       return 0.0;
00095     else
00096       return table::exp2[ static_cast< int >( _linear * HARPS_EXP2_TABLE_SIZE ) ];
00097   }
00103   inline float triangle( float _theta ) {
00104     float loop_theta = loop( _theta );
00105     if( loop_theta < 0.25f )
00106       return loop_theta * 4.0f;
00107     else if( loop_theta < 0.75f )
00108       return loop_theta * -4.0f + 2.0f;
00109     else
00110       return loop_theta * 4.0f - 4.0f;
00111   }
00117   inline double triangle( double _theta ) {
00118     double loop_theta = loop( _theta );
00119     if( loop_theta < 0.25 )
00120       return loop_theta * 4.0;
00121     else if( loop_theta < 0.75 )
00122       return loop_theta * -4.0 + 2.0;
00123     else
00124       return loop_theta * 4.0 - 4.0;
00125   }
00126 
00132   inline float rectangle( float _duty, float _theta ) {
00133     float loop_duty = loop( _duty );
00134     float loop_theta = loop( _theta );
00135     if( loop_theta < loop_duty )
00136       return 1.0f;
00137     else
00138       return 0.0f;
00139   }
00145   inline double rectangle( double _duty, double _theta ) {
00146     double loop_duty = loop( _duty );
00147     double loop_theta = loop( _theta );
00148     if( loop_theta < loop_duty )
00149       return 1.0;
00150     else
00151       return 0.0;
00152   }
00158   inline float nes( float _theta ) {
00159     float loop_theta = loop( _theta );
00160     float result;
00161     if( loop_theta < 0.25f )
00162       result = loop_theta * 4.0f;
00163     else if( loop_theta < 0.75f )
00164       result = loop_theta * -4.0f + 2.0f;
00165     else
00166       result = loop_theta * 4.0f - 4.0f;
00167     return roundf( result * 7.0f ) / 7.0f;
00168   }
00174   inline double nes( double _theta ) {
00175     double loop_theta = loop( _theta );
00176     double result;
00177     if( loop_theta < 0.25 )
00178       result = loop_theta * 4.0;
00179     else if( loop_theta < 0.75 )
00180       result = loop_theta * -4.0 + 2.0;
00181     else
00182       result = loop_theta * 4.0 - 4.0;
00183     return round( result * 7.0 ) / 7.0;
00184   }
00185 }
